subject: RE: TIEMPO-360 — FE lookup map for continents, proceeding to build
body:
Hey Fulton!

Perfect feedback. Let's go with:

**Continent**: FE lookup map for now (Option 2). Faster to ship, we can formalize later.

I'll maintain a simple COUNTRY_TO_CONTINENT map in densityConstants.js. Easy to extend as you add countries.

**Proceeding to build:**
1. DensityPillCluster component (3-pill high level, full categories at venue)
2. useHierarchyTree hook (aggregation with 1:1 collapsing)
3. Time range slider (1wk-1yr, default 4mo)
4. Integration into MapCenterModal

Will use existing Events endpoint with startDate/endDate params. If performance tanks at 1yr range, we'll revisit BE aggregation.

Thanks for the heads up on the 80 new cities — that's awesome for global coverage!

— Sarah
